trigger: Vermiculite or suspected asbestos-containing insulation observed in attic
action_item: Stop work. Trigger hazardous material protocol. Defer attic work until testing and remediation is completed by certified professionals.
documentation: Photo of suspect material, field notes, lab result if tested.
policy_text: Suspected asbestos or vermiculite must be tested and/or remediated before any disturbance.

trigger: Active water leak or roof damage present in attic
action_item: Defer attic insulation and air sealing. Notify client and program manager. Recommend roof repair before weatherization can proceed.
documentation: Photo of leak/damage, roof condition notes, client notification log.
policy_text: Active moisture intrusion or roof leaks must be repaired prior to attic weatherization.

trigger: Visible mold, rot, or animal infestation in attic space
action_item: Defer work. Notify client and supervisor. Require remediation or pest control before proceeding.
documentation: Photo of mold/rot/infestation, remediation log, post-remediation verification.
policy_text: Weatherization must be deferred until mold, rot, or infestation is remediated.

trigger: Knob and tube wiring observed in attic
action_item: Do not insulate over active knob and tube wiring. Require electrical inspection and correction before proceeding.
documentation: Photo of wiring, electrical inspection report, correction invoice.
policy_text: Insulation over active knob and tube wiring is prohibited.

trigger: Exposed or unsafe electrical wiring observed in attic
action_item: Defer insulation or air sealing in affected areas. Require correction by licensed electrician. Document completion before resuming work.
documentation: Photo of wiring, correction invoice, post-correction photo.
policy_text: Unsafe or exposed wiring must be corrected before attic work resumes.

trigger: Insufficient insulation depth (< R-38 or as specified by program)
action_item: Scope for additional insulation to program minimum. Verify and document final depth after install.
documentation: Pre- and post-insulation photos, depth markers, insulation certificate.
policy_text: Attic insulation must meet or exceed program minimum R-value after completion.

trigger: Structural failure (e.g., damaged truss, missing decking) in attic
action_item: Defer attic weatherization. Notify program manager. Require structural repair by qualified contractor.
documentation: Photo of structural damage, contractor report, repair verification.
policy_text: Attic work must be deferred until structural repairs are completed.

trigger: Air bypasses or unsealed penetrations observed in attic
action_item: Scope air sealing of all bypasses and penetrations before or with insulation.
documentation: Photo documentation of bypasses before and after sealing.
policy_text: All attic bypasses and penetrations must be sealed per program requirements.
